00026 
00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviQString.h"
00029 #include "KviHeapObject.h"
00030 
00031 class KviIrcNetwork;
00032 class KviIrcServer;
00033 class KviProxy;
00034 
00035 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionTarget : public KviHeapObject
00036 {
00037         friend class KviIrcConnectionTargetResolver;
00038 public:
00039         // pServer is a shallow pointer: this class makes a copy of it internally, must NOT be null
00040         // pProxy may be null if a proxy is not desired. this class makes a copy of it internally
00041         KviIrcConnectionTarget(
00042                         const KviIrcNetwork * pNetwork,
00043                         const KviIrcServer * pServer,
00044                         const KviProxy * pProxy = 0,
00045                         const QString &szBindAddress = QString()
00046                 );
00047         ~KviIrcConnectionTarget();
00048 private:
00049         KviIrcNetwork      * m_pNetwork;        // owned, never null, it's a COPY of the entry in the db
00050         KviIrcServer       * m_pServer;         // owned, never null, it's a COPY of the entry in the db
00051         KviProxy        * m_pProxy;          // owned, may be null, it's a COPY of the entry in the db
00052         QString           m_szBindAddress;   // forced bind address
00053 
00054 public:
00055 
00056         KviIrcServer * server()
00057         {
00058                 return m_pServer;
00059         }
00060         
00061         KviIrcNetwork * network()
00062         {
00063                 return m_pNetwork;
00064         }
00065         
00066         KviProxy * proxy()
00067         {
00068                 return m_pProxy;
00069         }
00070         
00071         const QString & bindAddress()
00072         {
00073                 return m_szBindAddress;
00074         }
00075         
00076         bool hasBindAddress()
00077         {
00078                 return (!m_szBindAddress.isEmpty());
00079         }
00080 
00081 protected:
00082         // this is for KviIrcConnectionTargetResolver only
00083         void clearProxy();
00084         void setBindAddress(const QString &szBindAddress)
00085         {
00086                 m_szBindAddress = szBindAddress;
00087         }
00088 };
00089 
00090 #endif //!_KVI_IRCCONNECTIONTARGET_H_
